abilities.name: High King of Fenris
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, in your Movement phase, you can select one friendly **SPACE WOLVES** unit that is in Strategic Reserves. If you do, until the end of the phase, for the purpose of setting up that unit on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

abilities.name: Guile of the Wolf
abilities.rule: Each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem, if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP (this is not cumulative with any other rules that increase the CP cost of that Stratagem).
